title: As the Dust Settles
atmosphere: Exhaustion mixed with relief. The crisis has passed, and now comes the reckoning. Depending on PC actions, this is triumphant or somber.
description: The eruption subsides. The Travellers face the consequences of their choices - recognition, gratitude, or difficult questions.
objectives: Process the aftermath of the crisis

heroic.reception: Heroes' welcome. Greener offers bonus. Masterton personally thanks them.
heroic.reputation: Known as heroes of the Salbarii eruption

competent.reception: Respectful farewell. Contract fulfilled. Ship is theirs.

problematic.reputation: Offworlders who looked out for themselves

narrator_prompt: The ash cloud thins. The rumbling fades to occasional grumbles. Mount Salbarii has spent its fury, for now. In the aftermath, there is counting - of survivors, of losses, of choices made under pressure. The Highndry stands ready, finally operational after all this time. But before departure, there is one more scene to play: the reckoning. What you did during the crisis will not be forgotten.
